document.full_text: fiat, which has a 30 percent stake in chrysler, will pay $12.3 billion for an additional 16 percent and aims to acquire a majority stake this year.
document.title: fiat to raise its chrysler stake to 46%
lines_and_colors: fiat, which has a 30 percent stake in chrysler, will pay $12.3 billion for an additional 16 percent and aims to acquire a majority stake this year.
